resources.string: If already claimed, please click next:
On the Account Activation page, fill in personal information and click OK.
On the Challenge Questions and Answers page, create 5 questions and answers for security purposes and click OK.
On the Choose a Password page, enter and confirm your password and click OK
On the User Activation Completed Successfully page, your Username and your Empl ID (CUNY ID) will be displayed.
How do I login to my student email?
What is the student e-mail website?
What is my City Tech Email Username?
MMDDYYYY + last 4 digits of your EMPL ID.
